achievements.name: The Distance of the Moon
achievements.desc: Complete 11 Plunging Attacks in a single Gravity Reduction Field, hitting an Experimental Field Generator.

achievements.name: Gravity Front
achievements.desc: Defeat an Experimental Field Generator without being hit by a "Gravity Ripple."

achievements.name: Shackle Me, That I Might Willingly Be Destroyed
achievements.desc: During the climax of "Icewind Suite: Dirge of Coppelia," use Coppelius's attack to make all the Dirge's whirlwinds undergo Elemental Conversion.

achievements.name: Crabs for the Crab Throne
achievements.desc: Defeat the Emperor of Fire and Iron while weakened.

achievements.name: Collezione di Sabbia
achievements.desc: Break the Xenomare Pearl directly without destroying the Resonant Coral Orb while the Millennial Pearl Seahorse is guiding Hoarthunder.

achievements.name: Fulgura Frango
achievements.desc: Defeat the Millennial Pearl Seahorse while it is attempting to re-construct a Xenomare Pearl.
